description:
Enjoy a library of ad-free and HD entertainment that includes Egyptian, Lebanese, and Syrian movies and series, as well as Turkish dramas, Japanese Anime, international blockbusters, and much more.

Yango Play offers a diverse range of entertainment: from heartwarming family sagas, to blockbusters directly from the cinema, to edge-of-your-seat dramas and thrillers, to laugh-out-loud comedy, to the biggest Arabic historical shows from the different parts of MENA region.

With access to Live TV channels, you can watch the biggest channels in the region, including:
– Al Arabiya
– Rotana
– MBC
– Roya
– Al Hadath

Listen to curated music collections and AI-powered endless playlists with the “My Vibe” playlist, that plays you songs that match your exact taste.

Watch the latest popular originals from Yango Play, including:
– Siko Siko
– One Last Sin
– The Silk Kingdom
– Restart
– Water Hassas

Crunchyroll, the world’s largest dedicated anime library, is now on Yango Play! Dive into a vast collection of anime, from legendary classics to the latest simulcasts, all in one app. Whether you’re into high-energy battles, heartwarming slice-of-life stories, or thrilling adventures, there’s something for every anime lover. Watch Demon Slayer, One Piece, Solo Leveling, and much more, while staying up to date with the newest episodes as they drop. With Crunchyroll now on Yango Play, your anime experience just got bigger and better!

That’s not all! You can also set up a family subscription for yourself and 3 other people who will have access to separate accounts and the opportunity to stream entertainment together on up to 20 devices ranging from phones, tablets, Smart TVs, and more.

Our premium service offers three types of subscriptions: weekly, annual, and lifetime.
Only weekly and annual subscriptions support auto-renewal. When auto-renewal is triggered, your account will be automatically charged for the renewal 24 hours prior to the end of the current billing period.

Discover videos from around the world and create your own with easy-to-use tools to capture your life. 

From your morning coffee to your evening commute, TikTok has the videos to make your day. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a travel lover or simply looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. Enjoy an endless stream of short videos on things you love most. Watch what you like, skip what you don’t. 
 
WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

 
CREATE
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. As many times as you need.
Millions of creators on TikTok showcase their incredible skills and every day life. Let yourself be inspired.
 
ENTERTAIN
Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators.

Take video creation to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. Unlock filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.
 
CUSTOMISE
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily edit your videos.
Trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.
 
ADD MUSIC
Add your favorite sound to your videos with millions of music clips and sounds. 
We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, EM, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

Obtain access to LIVE benefits to better interact with hosts!
Choose between a one-month subscription or auto-renewal subscription to enjoy special LIVE benefits (currently only available in limited regions)

Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase.

Buz TV - Movies & TV Shows is an unofficial informational tool that helps you stay up to date with movie and TV release dates.
You cannot watch or stream content in this app — Tubee is strictly for tracking and discovery.

With Buz TV, you’ll always be the first to know when a new season or episode is announced!

---

##  Features

*  Set Reminders for your favorite series and movie release dates.
*  Notifications for new seasons, episodes, and production changes.
*  Follow Actors and get notified about new shows and movies they’re in.

---

## Subscription Info

Tubee is free with ads. Upgrade to Tubee Pro to:

* Remove ads
* Unlock Smart Subscriptions
* Get Premium Notifications

Please note: Tubee Pro does not provide streaming. It’s an informational upgrade only.

Subscriptions will be charged to your iTunes account. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage or cancel auto-renewal anytime in your iTunes Store account settings.

---

## Credits

All metadata, artwork, and images are sourced from TMDb (The Movie Database), a community-maintained movie and TV database.

---

## Disclaimer

Tubee is an independent app and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or associated with any streaming service or company.

Tubee does not stream or connect to any streaming provider. It is an informational tool only.

Who's the imposter among your friends?
Imposter is the ultimate party game of bluffing, guessing, and social deduction. Grab 3-5 friends, sit around one device, and find out who’s lying.

How to Play:
1- All players see the same secret word—except one.
2- The imposter only sees the word “Imposter.”
3- One by one, players say a word related to the secret word.
4- The imposter must fake it and try to blend in without knowing the word.
5- Keep giving words and talking until someone thinks they've figured it out.

Fun, fast, and full of suspicion—perfect for game nights, road trips, or hanging out with friends.

Features:
- Play locally with 3 to 15 friends
- 10+ categories like food, movies, jobs, and more
- 500+ unique words and growing
- No accounts, no setup—just start playing
- Great for all ages—kids, teens, and adults

Built for laughs, bluffing, and epic "aha!" moments

Download now and start your next Imposter showdown!

https://imposterwho.com/terms
https://imposterwho.com/privacy

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

2. Renewal: 24 hours before your subscription expires, the renewal fee will be automatically deducted from your Apple iTunes account. After the renewal payment is processed, your premium membership will be extended automatically.

3. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iPhone "Settings"-->enter "iTunes Store and App Store"-->click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" choose GoodShort to unsubscribe. if you do not unsubscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

We are looking forward to hearing your comments and ideas. Please email us at contact@goodshort.com

تطبيق الأسطورة ياسين IPTV يمنحك أفضل طريقة لمشاهدة القنوات التلفزيونية والمباريات مباشرة في مكان واحد وواجهة عصرية وسهلة الاستخدام. سواء كنت من عشاق كرة القدم أو الأفلام أو الأخبار أو الترفيه، صُمم التطبيق ليمنحك تجربة مشاهدة سلسة وممتعة.

المميزات الرئيسية:
- قنوات ومباريات مباشرة: شاهد قنواتك المفضلة والمباريات في أي وقت ومن أي مكان.
- إدارة قوائم التشغيل بسهولة: أضف وعدّل ونظم قوائم IPTV الخاصة بك بسهولة تامة.
- تصميم عصري وجذاب: استمتع بواجهة رائعة وسهلة مع دعم الوضع الليلي والنهاري.
- بحث ذكي وسريع: ابحث عن القنوات أو المباريات بسرعة وسهولة.
- إشعارات فورية: احصل على تنبيهات للمباريات والأحداث المهمة.
- إعلانات محدودة: استمتع بتجربة شبه خالية من الإعلانات مع إمكانية إزالتها عبر الشراء داخل التطبيق.
- دعم كامل للغة العربية والإنجليزية.

كيفية الاستخدام:
تطبيق الأسطورة ياسين IPTV لا يوفر أي محتوى أو قوائم تشغيل. يمكنك إضافة قوائم IPTV الخاصة بك (بصيغة M3U) لمشاهدة القنوات المفضلة لديك.

لماذا تختار الأسطورة ياسين IPTV؟
- بث سريع وموثوق
- واجهة جميلة وسهلة الاستخدام
- تحديثات مستمرة وميزات جديدة
- خصوصيتك مضمونة: بياناتك تبقى على جهازك فقط

تنويه:
هذا التطبيق لا يوفر أو يتضمن أي محتوى أو وسائط. يجب على المستخدمين إضافة قوائم IPTV الخاصة بهم بشكل قانوني. التطبيق مخصص للاستخدام الشخصي والقانوني فقط.

What makes 'Joy Awards' truly special, as it does every year, is that the winners are chosen by the fans who love and cherish them. With the 'Joy Awards' App, it's you who will nominate and vote for your beloved stars and releases in Music, Cinema, Series, Directors, Sports, and Influencers, all for free!



You will nominate and cast your votes in two phases:




First Phase: Nominating Your Favorite Stars and Releases
In the nomination phase, which lasts for one month, you play a crucial role in shaping the competition. 
Here's where YOU come in – choose your favorite nominee from the names or titles listed in each category. If your top pick isn't there, don't worry! You have the chance to add your own favorite name or title, as long as it meets the terms and conditions: it should be a release or achievement from 2025. 
During the nomination phase, you can nominate only once for each category.
This phase eventually leads to the selection of the top four final nominees in each category, representing the stars and releases with the most nominations.
 
Second Phase: Voting for Your Favorite Stars and Releases
After the nominations have been counted, the voting phase begins with the top four nominees in each category, which also spans one month.
Here's where YOU make the difference – cast your votes for your favorite nominees. 
And a month later, the voting counts are gathered, leading to the grand reveal of the winners during the live "Joy Awards 2026" ceremony in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
During the voting phase, you can vote only once for each category.

Smarters Player Lite is strictly a standalone media player. It does not provide, host, sell, or promote any media content, TV channels, or streaming services. Users must add and manage their own legally acquired media.

description:
Private Video Saver offers a unique browsing experience beyond the basics. From QR code site access to AI-powered content summaries, it keeps your discoveries secure with passcode protection and automatically clears all traces, such as history, cookies, and cache, after every session! It also features a built-in video editor supporting video reverse, convert video, adjust volume, adjust speed, and flip & rotate, along with a convenient bookmark function for saving your favorite sites!


Features of Video Saver:

Video Editor
	• A built-in studio at your fingertips: convert video, reverse playback, adjust volume, change speed, and flip & rotate with ease.
Private Saver
	• Hidden behind an unbreakable vault, your private content stays invisible to anyone but you.
Quick QR Scan Access
	• Instantly unlock any website by scanning a QR code or url: fast, safe, seamless, and hassle-free.
Photo Identifier & Search
	• Turn every photo into unlimited power: identify, decode, and search the world in seconds.
AI Summarize
	• Quickly extract online article summaries, AI-powered insights in seconds.
Auto-Clear on Exit
	• Vanish without a trace: every session erases itself the moment you leave.
Bookmark Manager
	• Save, organize, and revisit your favorite sites anytime with a simple tap.
